cri-o

vendor libpod changes

Signed-off-by: Qi Wang <qiwan@redhat.com>

vendor libpod changes

Signed-off-by: Qi Wang <qiwan@redhat.com>

Add additonal device support to CRI-O

Add support to CRI-O to have additional devices.  This will allow machines
with specialized hardware to have all of its containers gain access to the device.

For example if you have a nvidia machine with a special GPU, you can tell CRI-O
to pull the device into every one of its containers.

Signed-off-by: Qi Wang <qiwan@redhat.com>

Add additonal device support to CRI-O

Add support to CRI-O to have additional devices.  This will allow machines
with specialized hardware to have all of its containers gain access to the device.

For example if you have a nvidia machine with a special GPU, you can tell CRI-O
to pull the device into every one of its containers.

Signed-off-by: Qi Wang <qiwan@redhat.com>

controller-runtime

Add default PR template

The template picker only works for issues, but you can still have
multiple PR templates that can be used with a query parameter, but
that's kind-of unweildy.  We'll have the default PR template, and keep
the separate ones around linked-to from the readme as examples.

Introduce KEP folder for SIG Autoscaling

This introduces a KEP folder for SIG autoscaling, similar to the ones
for other SIGs.

Introduce KEP folder for SIG Autoscaling

This introduces a KEP folder for SIG autoscaling, similar to the ones
for other SIGs.

KEP: Enhance HPA Metrics Specificity

This KEP introduces additional tools into the autoscaling/v2 API for
working with metrics, including support for a metrics label selector,
and expanded support for the `targetAverageValue` field.

kubespray

Add support for setting custom node taints (#3774)

Introduced variable node_taints which can be set in inventory for
specific hosts or in group_vars, which generates --register-with-taints
command line argument for kubelet.
